connector.description: Send mails to given SMTP server.

camel.kamelet.mail-sink.connectionHost.description: The mail server host Example: smtp.gmail.com

camel.kamelet.mail-sink.username.name: camel.kamelet.mail-sink.username
camel.kamelet.mail-sink.username.description: The username to access the mail box

camel.kamelet.mail-sink.password.name: camel.kamelet.mail-sink.password
camel.kamelet.mail-sink.password.description: The password to access the mail box

camel.kamelet.mail-sink.from.name: camel.kamelet.mail-sink.from
camel.kamelet.mail-sink.from.description: The `from` field of the outgoing mail

camel.kamelet.mail-sink.to.name: camel.kamelet.mail-sink.to
camel.kamelet.mail-sink.to.description: The `to` field of the outgoing mail

camel.kamelet.mail-sink.subject.name: camel.kamelet.mail-sink.subject
camel.kamelet.mail-sink.subject.description: The mail subject of the outgoing mail
